ckbtc_ledger.args: (variant { Init = record { minting_account = record { owner = principal "$(dfx identity get-principal)"; subaccount = null }; transfer_fee = 10; token_symbol = "ckBTC"; token_name = "ckBTC Test"; decimals = opt 8; metadata = vec {}; initial_balances = vec { record { record { owner = principal "$(dfx identity get-principal)"; subaccount = null }; 1_000_000_000 } }; feature_flags = opt record { icrc2 = true }; archive_options = record { num_blocks_to_archive = 1000; trigger_threshold = 2000; controller_id = principal "$(dfx identity get-principal)" } } })
